1.0.name: wordpress/best-custom-css
1.0.description: Custom Css plugin help you to manage your css files quickly and efficiently, directly from your dashboard. Overcoming the problems of IE is an everyday issue, which guzzles time and effort. With this plugin the administration of css files in your site becomes fast and easy as you are able to write css code from the admin panel for IE in separated files, and for all the other browsers in a single customized file. An option to edit your admin panel css file is also available, for customizing your own admin panel.
